content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel so shy when I try to express my feelings in front of my boss.
I can tell that you' re very anxious about the situation and are afraid to speak to your boss, especially in front of the boss.
Yes, I hate being refused and denied, so I don't dare to say it aloud.
That' s an incredibly difficult situation, especially when the boss is demanding that you disclose to him. Have you talked with your boss about this before?
